transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Hi, I'd like to schedule an appointment please.

transcript.speaker: patient

transcript.speaker: agent

transcript.speaker: patient

transcript.text: Of course. My date of birth is March 15, 1992, and my insurance is Blue Cross Blue Shield. My phone number is 555-234-5678.

transcript.text: System, so I can't proceed further right now. I'll make sure our clinic support

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Since I can't verify your info right now,

transcript.text: That's okay. Should I call back later, or would you prefer to contact me once the system is ready?
